formDescription: Submit your IT support needs using this form. Our team will respond as quickly as possible based on priority.

settings.customThankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting your request! You'll receive a confirmation email shortly with your ticket details. Our IT team will be in touch soon.

questions.questionText: What type of support do you need?
questions.subtitle: Select the category that best matches your request

options.displayText: Other (general IT support, account issues, other)

questions.subtitle: Provide a short title (e.g., 'Laptop won't turn on', 'Need Adobe license')
Please describe your issue in detail, including any error messages, what you were doing when the problem occurred, and steps you've already tried
questions.placeholder: Provide detailed information about your issue...

questions.subtitle: Help us prioritize your request appropriately

options.displayText: High - Work is blocked, urgent assistance needed immediately
Medium - Issue is impacting work but manageable for now
Low - Minor inconvenience, not blocking work

questions.subtitle: We'll use this to follow up (your Microsoft account email will also be recorded)

validation.message: Please enter a valid email address

questions.questionText: Your office location or desk number
questions.subtitle: Optional: Helps our team find you if on-site hardware support is needed
Optional: For urgent matters, we may call you directly

notifications.confirmationEmailBody: Automated confirmation handled by Power Automate flow

metadata.author: IT Automation Team
metadata.notes: This form template is designed for use with the IT Ticket Routing automation. Question IDs must match Power Automate dynamic content references.

deployment: 1. Create new form in Microsoft Forms (https://forms.office.com)
2. Manually recreate questions based on this JSON structure
5. Copy form ID for use in Power Automate
6. Test form submission before connecting to automation
customization: - Adjust priority definitions based on your SLA
- Customize thank you message with team contact info
- Consider adding attachment option for error screenshots
- Translate to local language if needed
notes: Microsoft Forms doesn't support direct JSON import/export
Use this template as reference when creating the form manually
Question order and IDs are important for Power Automate mapping
Test all conditional logic before production deployment

powerAutomateMapping.trigger: When a new response is submitted

q1.formsField: What type of support do you need?
q1.purpose: Determines assigned group through conditional logic

q2.purpose: Ticket title in SharePoint and email subject

q3.purpose: Full issue details for IT team

q6.formsField: Your office location or desk number

q7.purpose: Included in team notification email only

responses.q3: My laptop screen started flickering this morning when I opened it. It's making it impossible to work. The flickering is constant and happens regardless of what application I'm using. I've tried restarting but the issue persists.
I need Adobe Acrobat Pro to edit PDF documents for client presentations. My trial version expired yesterday. This isn't urgent but I'll need it within the next week.

I'm working from home today and I can't connect to the company VPN. I get error message 'Connection failed: Unable to resolve server address'. I need access to our internal systems urgently for a client meeting in 1 hour.
I'd like to update my email signature to include my new job title. Not urgent, whenever someone has time to help would be great.

preDeploymentTests.expected: Questions 1-5 show asterisk and prevent submission if empty
Invalid email format shows error message
All options visible in correct order

postIntegrationTests.expected: Flow run appears in history immediately after submission
SharePoint item contains all form data
